> That's it, huh? he thought, no one else but that stuck up PCU to wish

> me luck... With any chance, they'll thank me after that... Minions, 
> here I am! 
> 

Deep within his fortress Vorpal sat, his thoughts dark and brooding.
Beneath his hands lights flashed as information scrolled across a view
screen. Yes, he may have been silent all this time, but he had not been
idle. He had plans, and he had things in motion. And perhaps that
Cyclonus could be used to further his plans ... if he could be trusted.


He smiled as he checked a few more things. It would only be a matter of
time before the next step in his plan would be ready. One view screen
showed a desert scene on the earth. Vorpal was about to tap a few keys
to bring up more information about it when an alarm went off. 

"Unknown intruder." The computers annyingly mechanical voice reported.
"Sector 776." 

"Acknowledged." Vorpal grunted more then spoke. "I may not have fancy
new sweeps like you do Cyclonus, or as many of them, but I have a few
minions I can use." He said speaking to himself in a low growl of a
voice. Vorpal pressed another button and a few shapes emerged from an
alcove above his base, looking like something serpentine and yet
winged. Boosters flared from behind them as the trio of them take off
toward the intruder.

OOC: They should be visible to the newcommer as soon as he likes. They
do not appear to utilizing any sort of stealth gear.

Preston
(Vorpal)
